name: Survivor Idle Run
summary: Survive the zombie apocalypse and become the ultimate hero in Survivor Idle Run! Take control of your character and battle against hordes of flesh-eating zombies. Along the way, summon powerful allies to fight alongside you and merge them to create even stronger allies. Want to speed up the action? Click to enter fever mode and take down enemies at lightning speed! With idle gameplay, your hero will keep fighting even when you're away. Are you ready to take on the undead and save the world? Join the adventure now and become the ultimate survivor!
